title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\LocationPreference
name: LocationPreference
description:
Preferred location. This specifies where a Cloud SQL instance is located.

Note that if the preferred location is not available, the instance will be located as close as possible within the region. Only one location may be specified.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.LocationPreference

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.follow_gae_application
params.description: The App Engine application to follow, it must be in the same region as the Cloud SQL instance. WARNING: Changing this might restart the instance.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: The preferred Compute Engine zone (for example: us-central1-a, us-central1-b, etc.). WARNING: Changing this might restart the instance.

params.name: data.secondary_zone
params.description: The preferred Compute Engine zone for the secondary/failover (for example: us-central1-a, us-central1-b, etc.).
